attributes.description:
The noted price is for a cash purchase however we do offer finance through all banks including IEMAS and Investec. The finance price will be an additional R20 000. This vehicle has accident history however repaired as seen on images. Cash Price Noted Above, Dekra inspection (condition and diagnosis report) of R1580 will be done at your own cost.

Please note that our cash deals do not include VAT. We charge an additional admin fee of R3500 for license and registration, fuel and temp permit (if required).

Trading Hours: 8AM to 5PM (Mon-Fri); 8AM to 3PM (Sat & Public Holidays)
